data.title: Ten Designers Share Their Favorite Amazon Finds!
data.meta_description: Top inteiror designers share their favorite Amazon secrets finds treasures Prime Day shopping guide chic style
data.text:
Amazon makes near daily deliveries here at The Glam Pad… We are hooked on the convenience and also the boundless trove of treasures just waiting to be discovered. With Amazon’s Prime Day sale in full swing today and tomorrow, we decided to query some of our favorite interior designers and influencers to uncover their top Amazon go-tos! What are your favorite Amazon finds? We’d love to hear in the comments below!

Anthony Baratta

Anthony Baratta, The King of East Coast Chic

James Farmer

James Farmer Interiors

If in a pinch, designer James Farmer turns to Merville brand drapery hardware (mainly rings and French return/wrap around) are a good quick option on the design side. They are available on Amazon!

Ashley Hanley

Ashley Hanley in Richmond, VA

I love to put together lists for my clients with coffee table books to purchase to start their book collections on design, garden, etc. books.

I also find Amazon as a great resource for last minute party prep – block print tablecloths, cloth napkins and even Italian blown glassware. I’ll use this if I can’t find any of these types of goods locally at the last minute.

Sara Hillery

Sara Hillery Interior Design

Amazon is the perfect resource for design and landscaping books, jewelry organizers, drawer dividers, ribbons for the holidays for decorating the house, live bulbs, dishware, cocktail napkins, French onion soup bowls, office supplies, and more!

Kelli Delaney Kot

Founder / KDHamptons

TOPBUXUS Restore & Protect Mix is the magic ingredient to keeping all of my boxwoods in supermodel shape here at our Hamptons home, Maple Shade. The hedges framing my parterre garden, and all of the potted & planted boxwoods on the property are sprayed every 2-3 weeks during the summer season. They stay lush, green, and gorgeous!

Miles Redd

Redd Kaihoi

A classic piece at an affordable price.

Tug Rice

Artist

I pack this storage case when I know I’ll be wearing ties and pocket squares on a trip. The flap also fits rings, cufflinks, and other accessories. It’s slim, nice looking, and reliable.

This was a Christmas gift I gave my brother-in-law a couple of years ago. It’s the Cadillac of cork openers! Great for older, precious bottles that might easily break with a standard opener.

The secret to keeping an open shirt collar structured and in place. A minor thing but they help make you look sharp.

Pretty sure this really is the world’s best back scratcher. It’s actually kind of beautiful, too!

This book is like a crash course in dissecting what makes a successful living space. It breaks down all the visual elements of a home and breaks open the eye so you learn to appreciate the history, craftsmanship and quality of the components. Impressive and useful.

Jan Showers

Jan Showers & Associates

I love products from Biologique Recherche and order Lotion P50 and Masque Vivant.

They are French products and really great.

I also love Epionce Firming Mask.

It’s great when weather is dry and I leave on overnight

Of course, I love to buy books—can’t wait for my dear friend, Mark Sikes new book in September. I have pre-ordered it.

Just received Peter Marino’s new book.

Mally Skok

Mally Skok Design, Palm Beach, Florida

I love Amazon for buying pieces of furniture, accessories and glassware for my house, including:

Rivers Spencer

Clothing, Interiors, Antiques
